title: PES Life
content: Why do i feel so single. Basically I'm kinda introvert whenever I see couples i feel so bad ,I'm an average guy not bad looking also and i kinda find some girls cute  and don't know how to talk to them. I feel so bored on weekends also and anyone feeling the same dm me maybe we can go out

comments.body: Go on dating apps nd date older woman ezz. She ll give referral too opp
Petition to start a dating app just for pesu students
We got PESU Matrimony before GTA 6

Did bro put out an open date invite in the end of the post
